author: Emirates News Agency (WAM)
title: 1372148 pilgrims arrive in Kingdom
text:
(MENAFN - Emirates News Agency (WAM)) MINA 20th September 2015 (WAM) -- The number of pilgrims arriving from overseas for Hajj this year up until yesterday totalled 1372148 of whom 308 have died. 
The Saudi Press Agency SPA has quoted the daily statistics of the Directorate General of Passports which say that the number of pilgrims arriving by air totalled 1324175 by land 35050 and by sea 12923 figures that are 1% less or 15151 pilgrims fewer than the number of arrivals for the same period last year. 

WAM/AAMIR/Moran
